meaningMnemonic: You jump on your <radical>scooter</radical> with a big <radical>bundle</radical> to go as <kanji>fast</kanji> as you can! You have a bundle of pizzas in here, and they need to be delivered as fast as you can get them there!
readingMnemonic: You were going so <kanji>fast</kanji>, you only put on <reading>sock</reading>s (そく). So now you're barreling down the street at top speeds in just your sad, white socks.
